lore: "Being an egg never stopped me from becoming a detective," the Egg-Drop Sleuth said during the interview. "People think eggs are fragile and simple-minded, that you can just crack us open like we're good for nothing else," he said, shaking his magnifying glass. "But if we judged by looks alone, we'd never know that some eggs actually have two or three yolks inside!"
menagerieDialog: (They're nestled together, occasionally emitting soft peeping sounds.)
We may look fragile, but we'll crack some skulls!
Don't let our appearance fool you. We've got a few tricks up our... well, you know.
Our shells are tougher than they look. Bring it on!
(They're rolling around erratically, narrowly avoiding collisions.)
name: Egg-Drop Sleuth
